subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: After falling behind by three goals in a hostile building, the Pittsburgh Penguins apparently decided that they did not want to play a Game 7 against the Philadelphia Flyers, coming back for a 5-3 victory.
snippet: After falling behind by three goals in a hostile building, the Pittsburgh Penguins apparently decided that they did not want to play a Game 7 against the Philadelphia Flyers, coming back for a 5-3 victory.
